title: Feast
description: At the end of your life, will you just fade away to nothing or will you burn the candle just one more time? Australian author Dean Mayes (Gifts of the Peramangk, The Hambledown Dream, The Regenesis Cluster) poses a thought provoking essay about a man at the cross roads of his life that will leave you emotionally moved and crackling with possibilities.
author: Dean Mayes
